mapper.select: select tco.charge_money chargeMoney,tc.telephone from tb_charge_order tco inner join tb_customer tc on tco.customer_id = tc.id where tco.shop_detail_id = #{shopId} and tco.order_state = 1 and tco.finish_time >= CONCAT(#{beginDate}, ' 00:00:00') and tco.finish_time <= CONCAT(#{endDate}, ' 23:59:59')

select tco.shop_detail_id shopDetailId, IFNULL(COUNT(1),0) redCount, IFNULL(SUM(tco.reward_money),0) redMoney, IFNULL((SUM((select COUNT(1) from ( select top.result_data from tb_order td inner join tb_order_payment_item top on td.id = top.order_id where td.order_state in (2,10,11,12) and IF(td.is_pos_pay = 1,td.is_pos_pay = 1,td.production_status in (2,3)) and top.payment_mode_id = 7 and top.pay_time >= CONCAT(#{useBeginDate},' 00:00:00') and top.pay_time <= CONCAT(#{useEndDate},' 23:59:59') GROUP BY top.result_data ) r where r.result_data = tco.id))),0) useRedCount, IFNULL((SUM((select SUM(r.payValue) from ( select top.result_data, SUM(top.pay_value) payValue from tb_order td inner join tb_order_payment_item top on td.id = top.order_id where td.order_state in (2,10,11,12) and IF(td.is_pos_pay = 1,td.is_pos_pay = 1,td.production_status in (2,3)) and top.payment_mode_id = 7 and top.pay_time >= CONCAT(#{useBeginDate},' 00:00:00') and top.pay_time <= CONCAT(#{useEndDate},' 23:59:59') GROUP BY top.result_data ) r where r.result_data = tco.id))),0) useRedMoney from tb_charge_order tco where tco.order_state = 1 and tco.reward_money > 0 and tco.create_time >= CONCAT(#{grantBeginDate},' 00:00:00') and tco.create_time <= CONCAT(#{grantEndDate},' 23:59:59') GROUP BY tco.shop_detail_id

c.create_time>#{beginDate} and c.create_time<#{endDate}

SELECT c.id, c.charge_money, c.create_time, c.brand_id, c.shop_detail_id, c.type, u.telephone FROM tb_charge_order c INNER JOIN tb_customer u ON c.customer_id = u.id WHERE c.order_state = 1 AND c.brand_id =#{brandId} AND u.id =#{customerId}

SELECT COUNT(1) AS shopCount, SUM(charge_money) AS shopNum, SUM(reward_money) AS shopGaNum, ( SELECT SUM(charge_money) FROM tb_charge_order WHERE order_state = 1 AND type = 1 AND create_time>#{begin} AND create_time<#{end} AND shop_detail_id = #{shopId} ) AS shopWeChat, ( SELECT SUM(charge_money) FROM tb_charge_order WHERE order_state = 1 AND type = 0 AND create_time>#{begin} AND create_time<#{end} AND shop_detail_id = #{shopId} ) AS shopPos, SUM(charge_money)-SUM(charge_balance) AS shopCsNum, IF ( number_day_now > 0, SUM( reward_money - (((number_day_now - 1) * arrival_amount) + end_amount + reward_balance) ), SUM( reward_money - reward_balance ) ) AS shopGaCsNum FROM tb_charge_order WHERE order_state = 1 AND create_time>#{begin} AND create_time<#{end} AND shop_detail_id = #{shopId} GROUP BY shop_detail_id = #{shopId}

and shop_detail_id = #{shopId}
